Body: Developers are able to reply to reviews that are left on Google Play. When that happens, is the reviewer notified of the reply?I've noticed that some users reply back to the reply (by editing their comment), while others don't. So I am not sure if users who replied constantly check Google Play or the system actually send them a notification. I was unable to find such information anywhere.
Title: Will a reviewer be notified if a developer responds to their review on Google Play?

history.Text: You have an app on Google Play and a user leave a review with the message. You can reply to it. When you reply to it, is he notified that you replied to him?I've noticed that some users reply back to your reply (by editing their comment), while others don't. So I am not sure if users who replied constantly check Google Play or the system actually send them a notification that I replied to them. I was unable to find such information anywhere.
Is a user notified when you reply to his review?
Is a user notified when you reply to his review left on Google Play?

history.Comment: Development-perspective removed to avoid closure; this is a site for end-users
